1.16.5.1.1.0:
Add vault-spawn command.
Use GottschCore v1.1.0.
1.16.5.1.1.1: Fixed Exception message: java.lang.NullPointerException: Cannot get config value before spec is built error (again).

Fixed logging to use config settings*.
Fixed display name in .toml
1.16.5.1.2.1:
Fix PublicVault white/black list config settings - needs to be empty, not blank string.
Ditto for General Item whitelist and Tag white/black lists.
Fixed regex values in whitelist.
Fix VaultSlot.mayPlace() evaluations.
1.16.5.1.3.0:
Separated config out into common and server.
Fixed Std/Small vault interface.
Properly registered WorldEvent.Load event.
Fixed Db failure joining a world after exiting a world.
Fixed client-server communication sync-ing inventory.
